summary: Email chain between attorneys and a U.S. Attorney's Office regarding scheduling a call about the Epstein case in the Southern District of New York. The emails show coordination and appreciation for a prior meeting with an unnamed individual.

events.title: Request for call on Epstein case

events.title: Meeting regarding Epstein case

keyFacts: The emails involve scheduling and coordination between attorneys and the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York regarding the Epstein case in July 2019.
A prior meeting took place around July 13, 2019, between the U.S. Attorney's Office team and an unnamed individual, which was handled professionally and appreciated.
The correspondence indicates ongoing legal discussions and coordination in the Epstein case shortly before Jeffrey Epstein's death in August 2019.
Multiple redacted names and email addresses are present, indicating other involved parties not publicly disclosed.
